column4: ok screw this, i've delt with this problem like a billion flipping times and it is just escaping me in my old freaking age
how do i get apache / web browser to stop asking me to save the stupid .php output and just display it instead?
php5 is installed, the output is fine, if i take the time to save it to disk, then rename it to .html instead
follow the troubleshooting section for that problem on the wiki page
